single.description: Displays in the screen when one line is cleared

double.description: Displays in the screen when two lines are cleared at the same time

triple.description: Displays in the screen when three lines are cleared at the same time

tetra.description: Displays in the screen when four lines are cleared at the same time. Do not use copyrighted terms

spin.description: Displays when a spin is created but no lines are cleared. %1 is the name of the piece ('T', 'S')

spinsingle.description: Displays when a spin clears 1 line. %1 is the name of the piece ('T', 'S')

spindouble.description: Displays when a spin clears 2 lines. %1 is the name of the piece ('T', 'S')

spintriple.description: Displays when a spin clears 3 lines. %1 is the name of the piece ('T', 'S')

spintetra.description: Displays when a spin clears 4 lines. %1 is the name of the piece ('T', 'S')

spinmini.description: Displays when a mini spin is created but no lines are cleared. %1 is the name of the piece ('T', 'S')

spinsinglemini.description: Displays when a mini spin clears 1 line. %1 is the name of the piece ('T', 'S')

spindoublemini.description: Displays when a mini spin clears 2 lines. %1 is the name of the piece ('T', 'S')

spintriplemini.description: Displays when a mini spin clears 3 lines. %1 is the name of the piece ('T', 'S')

spintetramini.description: Displays when a mini spin clears 4 lines. %1 is the name of the piece ('T', 'S')

b2b.description: Displays when a tetra or spin line clear is performed when the previous one was also a tetra or spin line clear

pc.description: Displays when the entire board is erased
